mapper.insert: insert into product(productid, productname, productprice, productdes, productimg, productstock) values(#{productid}, #{productname}, #{productprice}, #{productdes}, #{productimg}, #{productstock})
mapper.select: select productid, productname, productprice, productstock, productdes, productimg from product order by productid
mapper.update: update product set productname = #{productname}, productprice = #{productprice}, productstock = #{productstock}, productdes = #{productdes}, productimg = #{productimg} where productid = #{productid}
